expo.name: Clean?
expo.description:
A simple tool that allows you to check if a song is clean. Uses the Happi API. Loosely based on the weather app from Fullstack React Native by Devin Abbott.

Version a1.0

Current Functionality:
  - Search a song, and the app will check if it is clean, how many swear words it has, and what percentage of the 
     song is swearwords
Future Functionality:
  - Better rating algorithm (more helpful)
  - Prettier UX
